definition: to excuse sb/to exempt/to remove or dismiss from office/to avoid/to avert/to escape/to be prohibited

sentences.english: The reason of application for exemption is incorrect.
In addition, an ally within 5 squares of you can make a saving throw.
sentences.chinese: 另外，位處你5格內的一名友方可以投一次豁免骰。

sentences.english: The exemption, Dr Denholm reckons, is "totally worthless".
sentences.chinese: 德諾姆博士認爲這種豁免“毫無價值”。

sentences.english: Touch of Idiocy no longer permits Heighten, as it has no save.
sentences.chinese: 愚鈍之觸將不禁升階了，因爲其無豁免。

sentences.english: The income tax is to be reimposed next year after ten years' exemption.
sentences.chinese: 所得稅經過十年的豁免後將於明年重新徵收。

sentences.english: Private attendants shall not enjoy the privileges and immunities provided for in the present Regulations.
sentences.chinese: 私人服務人員不享有本條例規定的特權與豁免。

sentences.english: It incited the government to impose tax on all of the immigrants.
sentences.chinese: 它慫恿政府向所有移民徵稅，一個也不能豁免。

sentences.english: Some angrily denounced its provision of immunity from prosecution for Mr. Saleh.
sentences.chinese: 一些人憤怒地譴責協議中豁免薩利赫的條款。

sentences.english: For any such exemption to be granted by the Director or the Registrar.
sentences.chinese: 該項豁免由處長或註冊官作出。

sentences.english: At the end of every seven years you must cancel debts.
sentences.chinese: 每七年的最後一年，你都要豁免他人一切的債項。

sentences.english: It was the immunity provision that dominated most of the debate on the bill in Congress.
sentences.chinese: 正是這個豁免權條款成爲國會對議案進行辯論的焦點。

sentences.english: Later, McCourt forfeited the parking lot in exchange for debt forgiveness.
sentences.chinese: 後來，M沒收了停車場作爲債務豁免的交換。

sentences.english: The hidden Immunity Idol stirs distrust among tribemates.
sentences.chinese: 隱藏的豁免象激起部落個成員的不信任。

sentences.english: How shall the criminal responsibility of foreigners who enjoy diplomatic privileges and immunities be investigated?
sentences.chinese: 享有外交特權和豁免權的外國人的刑事責任怎樣追究？

sentences.english: He claimed diplomatic immunity to avoid being arrested.
sentences.chinese: 爲了避免被捕，他聲稱享有外交豁免權。

sentences.english: Supports FISA and immunity for the telecommunications corporations.
sentences.chinese: 支持FISA以及對電信公司的豁免。

definition: to reduce or waive (taxes, punishment, rent, tuition etc)
to take effect/to go into effect
to prevent/to avoid/to excuse/to exempt/to relieve/(of a debt) to remit
to reduce payment/to annul (debts, bills, taxes etc)/to let sb off paying
signatory states/countries that are party to a treaty
permanent resident/person with the right to live in a country or territory
